It's probably the right one. On the Skidrow website, they do have this same rar on several file hosting sites in the same size, the problem is they forgot patch 1.10. What that means is if you put the DLC in your DLC folder it will break the game because it needs the patch to make it work. It says 1.10 is in progress but no idea how long it will take. this wipeface took it from skidrows site, which clearly states that its not a complete file yet.. they are stil working on the crack for 1.1, the rest of the dlc is there however.. the game MUST be updated with v1.0.1, 1.0.2, 1.0.3 and then with 1.1 in that order (using the exe from skidrows update 1, 2, 3 and soon to be 4) and then dragging the files from the bin/win 32 into your own directories.. then and only then will the DLC work

Note that installing the DLC will NOT break the game.. it just wont allow you to use any of the dlc untill its updated to 1.1, there will be a pop up when you start if you install all the current dlc, stating the games not up to date, some dlc wont function right (this is gaige they are talking about) it was done this way to prevent people like us, from playing gaige untill we got a crack working

I think this uploader just is trying to push things along, I know the DLC changes where the saves are located now, so there may be a small bump in getting the v1.10, may have to install a different version of the whole game.
